1.Pros: I loved the Mcdonalds I worked at! My coworkers were awesome and we all got along and same with most of the managers. We always got great ratings on customer service and the store owners would reward employees every month that really stood out. Overall it was a really positive place to work and you could tell the customers felt it too. The managers were usually really good about helping out when it got too busy and they would always call people in. There was always a great balance between having fun while working which always made it less stressful. Overall it was one of my favorite places working!
1.Cons: Theres only a couple downsides. Working at night and being the only person running the drive-thru was always stressful because we would hit big rushes and so people ended up having to wait longer for their food. And its a minimum wage job until you move up.

2.Pros: Fun to learn basics of management.

3.Pros: loved working with people and owner
3.Cons: some of the new managment team
